pages.text: Acquiring Terrasteel may be of interest for future pursuits. Something tells me I may have need of it for some kind of... door? Gateway? Portal?

pages.title: Elementium
pages.text: I had need of Elementium to construct the Elven Portal. Painting Terrasteel with lots of Pigment actually worked to make it, albeit imperfectly. Maybe this is an idea worth revisiting later.
